Text:
Thanks, I look forward to reading this.

I should publish my own chili recipe one of these days... I have to make it suspended in a magnetic field so it doesn't burn a hole to the center of the earth, LOL.

@bill - geez, is that all?  Not only do I have to use a magnetic field, I also have to do it in an inert gas atmosphere because otherwise it would spontaneously ignite...  

Edward Teller begged me for the recipe right up until the day he died.
Both you guys are full of it but I enjoyed your comments. Thanks!
